Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2008 12:30PM LindaAtWork wrote: THANKS to all of you who replied.  It just validated my suspicions.  Sometimes you get to the point that you feel like you are blaming anything and everything on chemo...
Posts.Title: Avastin Side Effect: Sinus Problems LindaAtWork LuAnnH

Posts.Content: LindaAtWork wrote: Hi Everyone: I have been on Avastin for about a year now.  The last few month, My upper left row of teeth and comes have been hurting.  I have been to the dentist, he really couldnt find anything, but did do a root canal.  He said he thought sinuses had something to do with the pain I was in.  This last weekend it started again.  I havent slept in days now and am in so much pain.  I'm conviced this is a sinus problem as it is not one tooth that hurts, but like 3 or four and the pain goes up into my cheek.  I was unsure who to call, so I called my family Dr.  I have an appt with him this afternoon at 5:30.  My question is, Has Avastin caused any others in here problems with their sinuses.  The standard side effects of Avastin, i.e. nose bleeds, nasal problems, gum bleeds, make me think that Avastin is related to this. Appreciate any thoughts any of you wonderful people will share with me. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Avastin Side Effect: Sinus Problems LindaAtWork LuAnnH
